data.title: Why You Want Us — Big City Horns
data.text:
Your guests WILL dance all night!

Your guests WILL compliment your choice of entertainment again and again wondering how you heard of us! The music will be the highlight of your event, leaving your guests asking for more!

HOW DO WE DO IT???

Building on YOUR vision, we partner with you to create a custom show tailored to your event. Bringing years of musical cred. as performers, writers, and arrangers, we know how to create a party that will capture your audience, keep them, and leave them wanting more!

It’s time you experienced the BIG CITY HORNS difference!

Our Story- Big City Horns

The most in demand Wedding & Special Events Party Band from Upstate NY, the Big City Horns is the ultimate live performance band bringing star power and infectious energy to every event. This 9 piece party band is continually voted in the top 5% of wedding bands in the nation by the Couples Choice Awards. They are the first choice for upscale weddings and corporate events.

BCH works with every couple and event planner to coordinate all timing and details ensuring a flawless and stress free night for the bride and groom. They share their years of event planning experience providing expert consultation in all facets of the wedding day or corporate event.

With state-of-the-art sound and lights, the Big City Horns incorporates choreography with award winning musicians and vocalists to provide a dynamic and engaging entertainment experience that keeps the dance floor packed all night. Their A-list talent includes an American Idol finalist, internationally acclaimed musicians who have performed with major national touring acts and a choreographed horn section that will wow every guest with their wall of sound and engaging performance.

BCH plays the perfect blend of dance music incorporating today's top charting hits with R&B, disco, funk, rock, soul, Motown, swing and country. They also provide the hottest DJ mixes to keep the party non-stop! From an elegant cocktail hour to a full blown after-party, no matter what you envision for your event, the Big City Horns is dedicated to creating an experience you and your guests will never forget!

Services Offered

The Big City Horns specializes in private functions including Social Events; Weddings, Mitzvahs; Corporate Galas and Fundraisers. They work with couples and event planners to design the perfect reception.

Q & A

How much does Big City Horns cost?

The price varies depending on factors such as travel location, performance time and production requirements.

What contact with the band will I have before the event?

Every detail of the timeline will be discussed well in advance to ensure a smooth, fun and exciting party. Please let the band know about songs for special dances as soon as possible.

What kind of Band is BCH?

It is a top-of-the-market event party band. They are one of the few bands in the country that you can count on to deliver a party that surpasses the highest expectations every time with exceptional talent. The type of event and number of people doesn’t matter– the ‘party’ will happen.

What does a typical event look like?

No two events are identical and no two performances are alike. For weddings, the best use of the band is one cocktail set of live or recorded music followed by a non-stop, high-energy dance party and show. BCH is very approachable and interactive and everyone is quickly involved in the fun. The band can also emcee awards or ceremonies, assist with the cutting of the cake or get your special guests on stage for some interactive fun.

From over-the-top dance party experiences to a big band, the Big City Horns can turn the wildest dreams for your event into a reality.

How can the band

customize my event?

WEDDING CEREMONY MUSIC:

All musical aspects of weddings can be covered, from traditional ceremony music to cocktail/lounge music, and reception dance music.

RECEPTION MUSIC:

BCH is also happy to learn any special request songs customized for your event including first dance and special father-daughter, groom-mother songs for your wedding reception or ceremony. Just ask and we’ll deliver!

DJ MUSIC:

BCH can create customized and special request DJ music so the music never stops!

COCKTAIL MUSIC:

For cocktails or dinner, BCH offers recorded or live music of sophistication including a saxophone and piano duo, instrumental jazz ensemble or optional vocalists to add smooth as silk vocal stylings, creating a classy atmosphere to any event. They perform standards from Michael Bublé to Frank Sinatra to smooth renditions of current hit songs.

How far will the band travel?

The group is based in Western NY and is available to travel any distance. They can also handle all travel arrangements for shows that require lodging, airfare, and sound/lighting equipment rental throughout the U.S. and internationally.
